quote: For the old people in my family—Mummy, the aunties, Granddad—the accumulation of beautiful objects is a life goal.Whoever dies with the most stuff wins.Wins what? is what I’d like to know.
quote_letters: FOR THE OLD PEOPLE IN MY FAMILY-MUMMY THE AUNTIES GRANDDAD-THE ACCUMULATION OF BEAUTIFUL OBJECTS IS A LIFE GOALWHOEVER DIES WITH THE MOST STUFF WINSWINS WHAT IS WHAT ID LIKE TO KNOW
